TextLibrary.Text: You have failed to defeat Sir Borik. You must try again.
You have defeated Sir Borik, and you take his helm as your prize.
Tauron is now awaiting one final piece of his God.
You must travel to Maethelburg in the Borderlands to see if you can find the Knight with the Crest.
You must travel to Drakenburg and challenge Sir Borik to a duel for his helmet.
You must return the Crest to Tauron at the Horned Temple.
Sir Borik is particularly powerful. His skills are high, he is well armored, and he has extra spells.
